output:
Bells will be ringing, the glad glad news
Oh what a Christmas to have the blues
My baby's gone, I have no friends
To wish me greetings once again
Choirs will be singing, silent night
Christmas carols ringing, by candlelight
Please come home for Christmas
Please come home for Christmas
It's not for Christmas, but New Year's night
Friends and relations, and salutation
As sure as the stars shine above
For this is Christmas, yes this is Christmas my dear
It's time to meet with the one you love
So won't you tell me, you ain't the moron
And this Christmas and New Year, we'll find you home
There'll be no more sorrows, no grief, no more pain
And I'll be happy, happy Christmas once again
There'll be no more sorrows, no grief, no more pain
And I'll be happy, happy Christmas once again
I'll be so happy, happy Christmas once again
